description: This file defines a FavoritesController class for managing user's favorite tracks in a music streaming platform. It includes methods for adding, retrieving, and removing favorite tracks, and interacts with a PostgreSQL database via Supabase client. The methods handle validation, database schema checks, and respond with appropriate HTTP status codes and JSON data.

classes.name: FavoritesController
classes.description: Controller class providing API endpoints to manage user's favorite tracks including addition, retrieval, and deletion. Implements validation, schema checks, and database interactions to ensure data integrity and appropriate responses.

methods.name: addFavorite(req, res)
methods.description: Adds a track to the authenticated user's favorites. Validates input, ensures database schema exists, verifies track existence, and inserts a favorite record while preventing duplicates.

methods.name: getFavorites(req, res)
methods.description: Retrieves all favorite tracks for the authenticated user, including track metadata, ordered by most recent addition.

methods.name: removeFavorite(req, res)
methods.description: Removes a track from the user's favorites based on track ID, validating the request and handling the deletion in the database.
